description: Nikola Petrak discreetly shares documents with a trusted whistleblower, unveiling a critical vulnerability in healthcare systems affecting BCI operations.
Medical staff begin noticing abnormal behavior in hospital management systems; internal discussions raise patient safety concerns.
Major hospitals experience data management failures affecting patient records, causing widespread alarm among healthcare professionals.
A leaked report highlights severe glitches in hospital systems, leading to public panic and demands for a thorough investigation.
Protests intensify outside major hospitals, fueled by circulating rumors of BCI malfunctions impacting healthcare quality and safety.
The Council faces increasing pressure as evidence links the hospital issues to outdated components of the BCI infrastructure.
Amid continued demonstrations, citizen groups call for a comprehensive review of BCI's influence on critical public services.
